    • attack

      public void attack()
      The zombie attacks a survivor in the same zone. If there is a survivor in the same zone as the zombie, the method randomly selects one survivor and inflicts damage to them based on the zombie's damage value. If there is no survivor in the same zone as the zombie, the method prints a message indicating that there is no survivor in the same zone.

    • attack2

      public void attack2()
      The zombie attacks a survivor in the same zone. If there is a survivor in the same zone as the zombie, the method randomly selects one survivor and inflicts damage to them based on the zombie's damage value. If there is no survivor in the same zone as the zombie, the method prints a message indicating that there is no survivor in the same zone.

    • getCell

      public Cell[][] getCell()
      Returns a 2D array of cells representing the game board.

      a 2D array of cells representing the game board

    • zombieAct

      public void zombieAct()
      The zombie performs an action based on whether there is a survivor in its current cell. If there is a survivor, the zombie attacks them. Otherwise, the zombie moves towards the noisiest cell.
